sentences.en: a coastal village fifteen miles south of Tourane
sentences.cn: 土伦以南15英里的一个滨海村落

sentences.en: A fifteen year old girl was among the injured.
sentences.cn: 受伤者中有一位15岁的女孩。

sentences.en: Fifteen minutes later he was undressed and in bed.
sentences.cn: 15分钟后他便穿了睡衣躺在床上了。

sentences.en: Fifteen-year-old Danny is on the run from a local authority home.
sentences.cn: 15岁的丹尼从地方当局的收容所逃跑了。

sentences.en: I send him fifteen dollars a month.
In the basement fifteen employees are busy making bespoke coats.
sentences.cn: 在地下室里，15名员工正在忙着缝制定做的外套。

sentences.en: It's eight-fifteen, dear, and your breakfast's ready.
sentences.cn: 8点15分了，亲爱的，你的早餐已经做好了。

sentences.en: More than fifteen thousand people took part in the memorial service.
sentences.cn: 有15,000多人参加了悼念仪式。

sentences.en: She arranged an appointment for Friday afternoon at four-fifteen.
sentences.cn: 她在星期五下午4点15分安排了一次会面。

sentences.en: Tanks had crossed the border at five fifteen and were grinding south.
sentences.cn: 坦克队于5点15分越过边境，正轰隆隆地缓慢向南开进。

sentences.en: The talks began some fifteen minutes late.
sentences.cn: 会谈晚了大概15分钟才开始。

sentences.en: They had left school at fifteen and were quite untutored in writing.
sentences.cn: 他们15岁就辍学了，几乎未接受过正式的写作训练。

sentences.en: They met when she was fifteen (= 15 years old ) .
They saw a squadron of fifteen motorcycle policemen driving in V-formation.
sentences.cn: 他们看见15名警察骑着摩托车排成V字形前行。

sentences.en: They've been at war for the last fifteen years.
sentences.cn: 最近15年来他们一直在打仗。

sentences.en: This beautiful and curiously shaped lake lies at around fifteen thousand feet.
sentences.cn: 这个形状奇特的美丽湖泊周长约有15,000英尺。

sentences.en: We waited a good fifteen minutes.

words.tran_cn: 第十五的；十五分之一的
十五；十五个；十五人组成的橄榄球队

phrases.tran_cn: （普通人的）昙花一现的荣誉；片刻的风光

trans.tran_cn: 十五；十五个；十五人组成的橄榄球队
